[[Emma Geller-Greene]] (great-grandniece) }} '''Muriel''' is a great-aunt of [[Rachel Greene]]. She never appears on-screen, but she is mentioned in "[[The One In Vegas, Part 2]]", in which Rachel describes the mustache and beard that Ross drew on her making her look like her great-aunt Muriel.
